77875.summary: Some customers in the Kildonan Crossing area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77875.title: June 5 - Winnipeg (Kildonan Crossing) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

77876.summary: Some customers in the Parkview area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77876.title: June 5 - Edmonton (Parkview) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
